CustomField.description: TC UI cache the all assigned assignments/project along with the milestones while it loads. This may lead to salesforce's viewstate limit, if user have many assignments/projects. Setting this config value to true will minimize this cache.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: TC UI cache the all assigned assignments/project along with the milestones while it loads. This may lead to salesforce's viewstate limit, if user have many assignments/projects. Setting this config value to true will minimize this cache.
CustomField.label: Disable cache
